title: New: LANY – Where The Hell Are My Friends
body:
I adore _Someone Else_, one of the tracks that LA trio **LANY** released last year.

Combining all the best elements of 90’s boyband pop, with a slick, modern twist, it’s no surprise that the group inked a deal with Polydor, and are gearing up for an even bigger year. New single, _Where The Hell Are My Friends_, is another slice of upbeat pop perfection; perfectly primed for a summer of festivals. Check it out below.

Follow our [On Repeat Playlist](https://open.spotify.com/user/crackintheroad/playlist/1UB6gJIZpmiO0H2zmSbg02) for a handpicked selection of the very best in new music; updated weekly.
